Job Description: Job description         Java 7 and above       Experience with Webservices like REST and SOAP (XML/JSON)       Hands on experience with Databases like MySQL, Oracle, SQL Server etc       Experience with Deployment Tools: Maven, Ant, Docker, Jenkins       Knowledge of Spring framework preferred, else experience with any MVC framework (Struts 2/ Spring MVC/ JSF etc.)       Strong knowledge of JavaScript/TypeScript, JQuery and AJAX       Working experience in Angular, ReactJS or Redux       Knowledge of Data structures, optimization algorithms and design patterns.       Experience with consumption of Webservices like REST and SOAP (XML/JSON)
